text: Jože Mehle (born 6 May 1980) is a Slovenian cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Slovenia Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ljubljana
title: Jože Mehle
